member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Cluster.ITaskboxClusterStore
member.summary: Defines the interface of a taskbox cluster store. The store manages the database that orchestrates instances, workers, and tasks in a taskbox cluster.
member.remarks: Be ware that this service uses a scope EF Core DbContext, which means that is service should be resolved within a service scope also.

member.summary: Defines the configuration options used by the concerning instances.

member.summary: The default value for .

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxInstanceOptions.DefaultHeartBeatSecs
member.summary: The default value for .

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxInstanceOptions.DefaultTasksCount

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxInstanceOptions.DefaultRetryCount
member.summary: The default value for .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxInstanceOptions.AutoStart
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the taskbox instance should be started automatically when the host starts or the first operation is performed on it by the host. The default value is .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxInstanceOptions.IdleTimeSecs
member.summary: Gets or sets the taskbox idle time in seconds. The default value is seconds. Each instance will "sleep" this amount of time before checking if there are tasks that should be executed, performing fail-over, etc.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxInstanceOptions.HeartBeatSecs
member.summary: Gets or sets the time, in seconds, after which a taskbox instance will be considered as failed because it did not report its status (heart beat). The default value is seconds.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxInstanceOptions.TasksCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of tasks that should be processed in a single execution cycle of the taskbox instance. The default value is . It can be set to a value from 1 to 100.
member.remarks: After the taskbox instance "sleeps" for seconds, it will try to load up to tasks and then try to execute them using all the available workers.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxInstanceOptions.MaxQueueSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size of the taskbox instance queue. This determines the maximum number of tasks that may be in the queue waiting to be picked by a worker. If exceeded, the taskbox instance will not enqueue any more tasks, and these will remain in the cluster to be picked up in the future (by the same or other taskbox instance). The default value is * 2.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxInstanceOptions.RetryCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of times a failing task will be retried. The default value is . It can be set to a value from 0 to 100.
member.remarks: Any that which execution fails with a transient error it will be retried up to this number of times. If retry count is 2, the task may be executed 3 times.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxInstanceOptions.Locking
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration options concerning locking.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: The default value for .

member.summary: The default value for .

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxLockingOptions.DefaultAbsoluteExpirationSecs
member.summary: The default value for .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxLockingOptions.MaxRetries
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times to retry to acquire a lock. The default value is .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxLockingOptions.WaitTimeSecs
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to wait in seconds before retrying to acquire a lock. The default value is .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxLockingOptions.AbsoluteExpirationSecs
member.summary: Gets or sets the lock absolute expiration in seconds. The default value is .

member.summary: Defines the configuration options used by the concerning tasks.

member.summary: The default value for .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTasksOptions.ActionsTimeoutSecs
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time (in seconds) that all the actions of a task may take to execute. The default value is .
member.remarks: If this timeout is exceeded, the task action executing will be canceled and the task will be set as failed.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTimeToLiveOptions
member.summary: Defines the configuration options used by the to set the tasks time to live.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTimeToLiveOptions.DefaultTimeToLive
member.summary: The default time to live.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTimeToLiveOptions.CompletedTasksTimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to live (in seconds) that should be applied to tasks in the state. The default value is 7 days. For tasks to never expire, this value should be set to -1.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTimeToLiveOptions.FailedTasksTimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to live (in seconds) that should be applied to tasks in the state. The default value is 7 days. For tasks to never expire, this value should be set to -1.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTimeToLiveOptions.CanceledTasksTimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to live (in seconds) that should be applied to tasks in the state. The default value is 7 days. For tasks to never expire, this value should be set to -1.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTimeToLiveOptions.FailedInstancesTimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to live (in seconds) that should be applied to taskbox instances in the state. The default value is 7 days. For instances to never expire, this value should be set to -1.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTimeToLiveOptions.StoppedInstancesTimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to live (in seconds) that should be applied to taskbox instances in the state. The default value is 7 days. For instances to never expire, this value should be set to -1.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTimeToLiveOptions.FailedWorkersTimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to live (in seconds) that should be applied to taskbox workers in the state. The default value is 7 days. For instances to never expire, this value should be set to -1.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTimeToLiveOptions.StoppedWorkersTimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to live (in seconds) that should be applied to taskbox workers in the state. The default value is 7 days. For instances to never expire, this value should be set to -1.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxTimeToLiveOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: The default value for .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxWorkersOptions.WorkersCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of workers that may be executing tasks in the taskbox instance. The default value is * 2.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskboxWorkersOptions.WaitTimeSecs
